function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of cumulative cases reporting after 25 March 2020","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement alternative methods for tracking and reporting cumulative cases.","Technologies":"Data analysis and visualization tools.","People":"Public health officials, government agencies, and researchers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies, and research institutions."},{"Description":"Sensitivity of estimated averted/delayed infections to modeling assumptions","Impact":"Uncertainty in the estimation of averted/delayed infections due to different modeling assumptions.","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analyses and model validation to assess the impact of alternative modeling assumptions.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and simulation software.","People":"Epidemiologists, researchers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Assumption of recovery/death rates in countries without direct observation","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of recovery/death rates leading to erroneous calculation of infectiousness parameters.","Mitigation":"Validate assumptions using data from multiple sources and conduct sensitivity analyses.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software and data validation tools.","People":"Epidemiologists, researchers, and public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations."}]}
